x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement: Organizations struggle to measure, monitor, and reduce their carbon emissions due to fragmented data, manual reporting, and lack of real-time insights. Without a structured system, sustainability initiatives often fall short, and employees remain disengaged in eco-friendly practices.
x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

  • Employee center Portal: Employee-friendly interface for logging activities.
  • Dashboards & Reporting: Visualize trends and departmental performance.
  • Flow Designer: Automate carbon calculations, notifications, and reminders.
  • Service Catalog: Structured forms for data entry.
  • Notifications & Alerts: Encourage timely logging and highlight high-impact actions.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • Reliable carbon footprint calculation formulas based on activity type.
  • Optional integration with corporate travel, energy, or facilities systems.
  • Configurable data models to support different industries and organization sizes.

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

  • Ensuring accurate and consistent data capture from employees.
  • Maintaining employee engagement over time.
  • Designing scalable dashboards for large organizations with multiple departments.
  • Aligning calculations with industry-standard carbon reporting methods.
